name: futurize
description: Turn callback-style functions or promises into futures

scripts.test: babel-node node_modules/isparta/bin/isparta cover --include-all-sources --report lcov --report html node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --require babel-core/register
scripts.patch-release: npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags && npm run clean
scripts.minor-release: npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags && npm run clean
scripts.major-release: npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags && npm run clean
